item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. China deflation pressure mounts as investors seek more stimulus for economy
2. Former Scottish first minister Alex Salmond dies aged 69
3. European carmakers plan dozens of cheaper models to survive ‘EV winter’
4. Teenage social media use strongly linked to anxiety and depression
5. Etihad aims to persuade more long-haul passengers to fly via Abu Dhabi
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
